summary: Something of a "Mad World" themed Daedric Armour.
descriptionHtml: Yeah, a re-texturing of an in-game object. Oh, what a surprise, coming from me. Well, hoping this won't be utterly hated like almost every other mod I've done, here's a "Mad World" kinda-themed [color=#000000]D[color=#ff0000]a[/color]e[color=#ff0000]d[/color]r[color=#ff0000]i[/color]c A[color=#ff0000]r[/color]m[color=#ff0000]o[/color]r. [color=#ffffff]Just that.[/color][/color]
author: TwoSyxxtySeven
